subject: Re: North Shore Radiology and Nuclear Medicine PACS access revamp
preview: This should be closed as tagged as custom dev: NSRNM | Form Updates

full_threads.body: This should be closed as tagged as custom dev: NSRNM | Form Updates

@cindy + @joel - last update >7 days ago on this. What are next steps?

(If we dont have list of services, hide that field that proceed with publishing rest o them)

Hi Grant,

Just a quick update on our progress:
  • We’ve updated the fields as requested.
  • We tested the Twilio integration for the Gravity Form.

As part of this, we created a test account using our own email and successfully set up the integration.

To proceed, could you please:
  1. Create a Twilio account and share the login credentials with us?
  2. Provide the phone number you'd like us to use as the "From" sender?

We're also waiting for the list of services to include in the dropdown, as requested. Just to clarify—can you confirm that this list should not be added to the Services post type?

Let us know how you'd like to proceed.
Correction - "Existing user - Password / MFA Reset"

After further review, could you please:

Also amend "Existing user" to "Existing user/ MFA Reset", please?

Remove the mandatory state to Provider Number?

I also notice the username field is not in the form so ignore that prior comment.

Having the email instructions alongside the Email Address label would still be ideal.

Kind regards,

Jonathan Abdipranoto - Senior Clinical Applications Specialist - 0408660816

North Shore Radiology and Nuclear Medicine

This was already moved to Clickup - https://app.clickup.com/t/86cz03vtn. Will be actioned to new ticket -
https://secure.helpscout.net/conversation/2956826251

Thanks for the cloned and updated version, Cindy. I just have a couple more asks:

Could you please remove the username field from the form?

Could you also add the email instructions that are currently under the email field and place them along side the email field label?

I'll provide you a list of specialties on Monday when I'm back at work.

Kind regards,
Jono

Hello Jono!

Just giving you a quick update on the requests you have sent us.

We’ve cloned the existing form and implemented the updated version on the following page:
https://northshoreradiology.com.au/for-referrers/inteleviewer-pacs-accessnew/

The only remaining items on our list are:
  1. We would like to change the Phone Number field to a Mobile Number field.
    • This ties into another desire that, when a submission is made, a confirmation text message is sent.
      Note: We’ll be using an integration for this—either Zapier or Twilio. This has not been set up yet, and we may require some details from your end to proceed. We’ll reach out next week regarding the setup.

  2. We would like the Specialty field to be a drop-down list that can be filtered by typing. There should be the ability to add free text is the option for a specialty is not available. The drop-down list should be populated by a list that we can provide from our PACS so that there is a 1:1 relationship between the drop-down list and our list of specialties.
    Note: Can you confirm that the list should be coming from the Services Category from the backend?

Please review and let us know if any further adjustments are needed.
This was already moved to Clickup - https://app.clickup.com/t/86cz03vtn. Will close this ticket now.

Hi Cindy,

Sorry for the late response. Thank you for the update and I'll wait to hear back from you when the sample page is completed.

Kind regards,

Jonathan Abdipranoto - Senior Clinical Applications Specialist - 0408660816

North Shore Radiology and Nuclear Medicine

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Hi Jono.

Just giving you an update that we have lined this up to our pipeline and is scheduled to get completed this week.

We are creating a sample page where the duplicated form will be displayed and you can test.

We'll update you once this is completed.

Hi Jono,

Yes thats fine - it will add slightly more time as we will need to duplicate the form to showcase, then make the changes.

We will aim to keep everything under 7 hours total.

full_threads.body: This ticket has been open for over 5 days. If action is still required, please prioritize it. Otherwise, kindly provide an update - either to confirm it can be closed or if a follow-up with the client is needed.

Hi Andy,

Would you be able to do a mock up the changes and how they would look on our website before these changes are put into production?

We would like to look at it and, if possible, test it before we get to that point.

Kind regards,

Jonathan Abdipranoto - Senior Clinical Applications Specialist - 0408660816

North Shore Radiology and Nuclear Medicine
Task created under custom dev and assigned to Whil: NSRNM | Form Updates. Can be started today but scheduled to be completed Friday. Thanks @andy

@cindy - lets pass this one to Whil to complete?

@daphne - can help with the text message piece (from Zapier should work).

Hi Andy,

Having spoken to Grant, we're happy for you to make those changes. Cheers.

Kind regards,

Jonathan Abdipranoto - Senior Clinical Applications Specialist - 0408660816

North Shore Radiology and Nuclear Medicine

@joel / @cindy / @daphne - please use this as the template when responding to complex requests (break it down in itemized tasks below the email). Thank you 🙏

Adding time for scoping too (Time: 15mins)

Hi Jono,

Thanks for the context. I've put responses below.

1,2,4,5,6 and 8 are straightforward and we estimate ~2 hours to update and QA.

3 and 7 are more complicated and would require a ~4 hours to complete. and QA.

Please let us know if you'd like us to proceed. We could have this done next week.

Thank you,
Andy

Requirements Review
  1. We would like a new field that starts with "Confirm requirements" and has three options of:
    1. Existing user
    2. Referrer - New account
    3. GP/Allied/Interstate/Other - Once-off access
    4. AC - Confirming we can add the field
  2. We would like to change the Phone Number field to a Mobile Number field.
    1. AC - Confirming we can update this field
  3. This ties into another desire that, when a submission is made, a confirmation text message is sent.
    1. AC - this is possible, although will require ~3 hours of integration work with Zapier /Twilio
  4. The Email Address header needs to specify to the user "Please provide work/healthcare email address if possible"
    1. AC - Confirming we can update this field
  5. Under Provider Number field, we would like an Organisation Name field.
    1. AC - Confirming we can add the field
  6. We would like the Specialty field to be a drop-down list that can be filtered by typing.
    1. AC - Confirming a drop down list can be added, however will need to confirm if filtering by typing is possible
  7. There should be the ability to add free text is the option for a specialty is not available.
    1. AC - confirming the user experience would be selection of 'Other' then reveals a new text box of 'Please specify'
  8. The drop-down list should be populated by a list that we can provide from our PACS so that there is a 1:1 relationship between the drop-down list and our list of specialties.
    1. AC - Confirming that this can be done, please share the list
This ticket has been waiting for over 24 hours.

Hi Andy, This is what our thinking is with a screenshot as an example:
  • We would like a new field that starts with "Confirm requirements" and has three options of:
    • Existing user
    • Referrer - New account
    • GP/Allied/Interstate/Other - Once-off access
  • We would like to change the Phone Number field to a Mobile Number field.
    • This ties into another desire that, when a submission is made, a confirmation text message is sent.
  • The Email Address header needs to specify to the user "Please provide work/healthcare email address if possible"
  • Under Provider Number field, we would like an Organisation Name field.
  • We would like the Specialty field to be a drop-down list that can be filtered by typing. There should be the ability to add free text is the option for a specialty is not available. The drop-down list should be populated by a list that we can provide from our PACS so that there is a 1:1 relationship between the drop-down list and our list of specialties.
Kind regards, Jonathan Abdipranoto - Senior Clinical Applications Specialist - 0408660816 North Shore Radiology and Nuclear Medicine
